author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10008251

Discover the motivation behind Joe Musashi's quest for vengeance as he faces an unparalleled evil in SHINOBI: Art of Vengeance.

The iconic SHINOBI returns in an all-new 2D action platformer with a unique hand-drawn look created by the team behind the hit brawler Streets of Rage 4. Pre-order SHINOBI: Art of Vengeance to receive a 10% discount, the Original Arcade Outfit, and the Fortune Hunter Amulet. Opt for the SHINOBI: Art of Vengeance Digital Deluxe Edition to play 3 days early and receive the Ghost Outfit, Medic Lite Amulet, 2000 Gold, Digital Art Book & Soundtrack, and the SEGA Villains Stage, featuring bosses based on iconic SEGA villains

Available August 29, 2025! 

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #shinobi
title: Shinobi: Art of Vengeance - Story Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

Sometimes, a colossal, walking machine is all you need…

SAND is an open-world PVPVE extraction shooter where players navigate giant walkers across the post-apocalyptic dunes of a fallen planet. Build your trampler, battle rival players, explore, loot and extract valuable resources in a hostile, ever-changing world.

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/product/EB1674-PPSA28209_00-MINDSEYESTANDARD/

Introducing MindsEye

Build A Rocket Boy, the studio founded by visionary game director Leslie Benzies, and IOI Partners have released the Introducing MindsEye trailer, offering the most detailed glimpse yet into the game’s world. Set in the near-future desert metropolis of Redrock, MindsEye is a cinematic, narrative-driven AAA game where corporate power, political ambition, and surveillance collide.

You’ll step into the role of Jacob Diaz, whose personal mission escalates into a far-reaching conspiracy involving criminal forces, an unchecked military, and a threat so sinister it endangers humanity. The trailer showcases explosive action, high-stakes storytelling, and next-gen gameplay.
MindsEye also introduces Play.MindsEye, a continuous stream of developer-created content, and Build.MindsEye, a powerful tool that lets you create your own missions and environments with no prior programming experience.

Mind
title: Introducing MindsEye | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10010892

Pre Order Date Everything! and fall in love, befriend and even become enemies with 100 fully voice-acted dateable characters! 

🎙️An ENORMOUS cast
🏡 Set in your own home
💘 Multiple endings
🗣️ Over 70,000 voicelines 

📅 June 17 on PlayStation 5!

About Team17 Group plc: 
Founded in 1990, Team17 Group plc is a leading developer, video games label, and creative partner for developers around the world. Floated on AIM in 2018, Team17, with its extensive portfolio of over 100 titles, embodies the spirit of independent games. In addition to the award-winning Overcooked!, Yoku’s Island Express, and the iconic Worms, which celebrated its 25th anniversary in 2020, Team17 has helped bring critically acclaimed titles including Hell Let Loose, Moving Out, Golf With Your Friends, Yooka-Laylee and the Impossible Lair, Blasphemous, and The Escapists to gamers everywhere. 

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games 

Rated Mature
title: Date Everything! - Pre Order Now | PS5 & PS4 Games
